macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Mixed in Early 2026 Trading
items.summary: The Dow Jones fell 0.6% to 49,098.71 while the Nasdaq rose 0.3% to 23,501.24; S&P 500 up 1% year-to-date amid high valuations above 22 times earnings and focus on AI investment returns.

items.title: S&P 500 Consolidates Near All-Time Highs Around 7,000
items.summary: S&P 500 tests resistance at 6,980-7,000 after late-2025 rally, with support at 6,805-6,836; market awaits catalysts like Fed policy amid bullish momentum since May 2025.

items.title: Stock Market Signals Warn of Surging Inflation in 2026
items.summary: Rotation to value stocks, small-caps, and energy/materials (up 9% YTD) echoes pre-2022 inflation trends; JPMorgan sees no Fed cuts in 2026, possible hike in 2027 despite market expectations.

items.title: Fed Rate Decision Looms on January 28
items.summary: FOMC expected to hold rates at 3.75%; markets focus on Powell's guidance on inflation, labor, and rate path amid upcoming data like Durable Goods Orders on Jan 26 and Core PPI on Jan 30.

items.title: US Final GDP Beats Expectations at 4.4%
items.summary: Q4 GDP revised higher to 4.4% annualized vs. 4.3% expected, but had limited market impact as Russell 2000 rose strongly in January while S&P 500 traded sideways.

items.title: Multiple Companies Announce Reverse Stock Splits for Nasdaq Compliance
items.summary: C3is (1-for-20), 22nd Century (1-for-15), and another firm execute reverse splits effective January 26 to meet minimum bid price requirements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Falls Below $88,000 USD with 1.59% 24-Hour Decline
items.summary: BTC/USDT dropped to $87,970, marking a 1.59% decline over the past 24 hours according to Gate market data. Earlier reports noted BTC briefly breaking through $88,000 before falling back.

items.title: Ethereum Drops Below $2,900, Erasing 16% of January Gains as Whales Accumulate
items.summary: ETH slipped below $3,000 and further to under $2,900, entering volatile consolidation after a 16% drop in January 2026 gains. Whale accumulation and a bullish pennant pattern on the monthly timeframe suggest potential breakout if support holds.

items.title: BlockDAG Presale Nears January 26 Closure with Over $441M Raised and 50x ROI Promised
items.summary: BlockDAG (BDAG) has raised over $441 million in its presale, with 3.5 billion tokens left at $0.003 before the January 26, 2026 cutoff, promising a fixed 50x return to $0.05 listing on February 16. The project highlights its hybrid DAG+PoW tech, 1,400 TPS, and institutional backing amid high demand.

items.title: Binance Founder CZ Discusses Prison, Pardon, and 2026 Bitcoin Super Cycle at Davos
items.summary: Post-prison and after a pardon from President Trump, CZ Zhao shared reflections on Binance, industry regulation, and predicted a Bitcoin super cycle in 2026 during a Davos interview. He emphasized crypto's four-year cycles and U.S. policy impacts.

items.title: ZachXBT Links $40M U.S. Government Crypto Theft Suspect to CMDSS CEO's Son
items.summary: Investigator ZachXBT identified the suspect in a $40 million on-chain asset theft from the U.S. government as potentially the son of CMDSS CEO, with the hacker reportedly flaunting stolen wealth.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: HKU Researchers Unveil ClairS-TO and Clair3-RNA for Advanced Cancer Genomics
items.summary: University of Hong Kong engineers have developed two deep-learning algorithms, ClairS-TO and Clair3-RNA, enhancing genetic mutation detection in tumor-only samples and long-read RNA sequencing for precision medicine. The tools, published in Nature Communications, improve accuracy in cancer diagnosis and genomic research.[1]

items.title: Northeastern University Launches London AI Tech Hub with IBM Collaboration
items.summary: Northeastern's new London campus hub focuses on next-gen AI hardware with IBM, AI misbehavior detection in LLMs like ChatGPT, neuromorphic and quantum computing, and efficient LLM accelerators funded by UK ARIA.[2]

items.title: Grab Acquires Chinese AI Robotics Startup Infermove for Delivery Automation
items.summary: Southeast Asian superapp Grab has acquired Infermove to boost AI-driven robotics for first- and last-mile delivery, using imitation and reinforcement learning from rider data to navigate complex environments.[3]

items.title: LangChain Introduces Insights Agents for Scaling AI Agent Behavior Analysis
items.summary: LangChain launches 'insights agents' tooling to trace, diagnose, and analyze AI agent behavior beyond standard metrics, critical for reliable scaling of agents in knowledge work.[4]

items.title: Indian Navy Deploys AI-ML Systems in First Operational Use on INS Surat
items.summary: INS Surat, India's first AI-integrated warship, successfully tested AI tools for surveillance, threat assessment, and decision-making during Operation Sindoor, paving way for predictive maintenance and training.[6]

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Bandai Namco Announces New Dragon Ball Game Project 'AGE 1000' for 2027
items.summary: Bandai Namco revealed a new Dragon Ball game titled 'AGE 1000' in development for about 6-7 years with heavy involvement from Akira Toriyama, featuring a never-before-seen world and characters, set for release in 2027. Additional details will be shared at Dragon Ball Games Battle Hour 2026 in April, alongside new DLC announcements for DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO including 'Mission 100' mode launching January 26.

items.title: Epic Games and Google Sign $800 Million Six-Year Unreal Engine Deal
items.summary: Epic Games and Google have entered a reported $800 million six-year agreement for Unreal Engine and related services, including joint marketing efforts, as part of Epic's growth plans without special treatment for the Epic Game Store.

items.title: Garena Unveils 2026 Free Fire Esports Roadmap
items.summary: Garena announced its 2026 esports roadmap for Free Fire, outlining plans for competitive events and developments in the battle royale title's esports scene.

items.title: Multiple Game Launches and Updates: Duet Night Abyss, Arknights Endfield, Snowbreak 3.5, Wuthering Waves 3.1
items.summary: Recent gaming updates include launches and major patches for Duet Night Abyss, Arknights Endfield, Snowbreak Containment Zone version 3.5, and Wuthering Waves version 3.1, with a full release schedule for titles from January 26-29.

items.title: New Emulation Hardware from Anbernic, TRIMUI, and Mangmi
items.summary: Anbernic introduced the RG01 alongside new emulation devices from TRIMUI and Mangmi, highlighting advancements in portable retro gaming hardware.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: CrowdStrike and Nord Security Announce SMB Cybersecurity Partnership
items.summary: CrowdStrike and Nord Security have launched a strategic partnership combining CrowdStrike’s Falcon platform with Nord’s secure access and credential management to bolster cybersecurity for small-to-medium businesses amid rising threats.

items.title: Netskope Releases 2026 Cloud and Threat Report Highlighting Cybersecurity Trends
items.summary: Netskope unveiled its 2026 Cloud and Threat Report, analyzing key cybersecurity trends from the prior year and previewing enterprise risks, noting a threefold rise in SaaS genAI app usage and doubled incidents of sensitive data exposure.

items.title: Cloudflare’s 2026 App Innovation Report Reveals Modernization Gap
items.summary: Cloudflare published its 2026 App Innovation Report based on a survey of 2,351 APAC leaders, finding that modernized applications make companies three times more likely to achieve AI returns, with 93% citing software updates as key to boosting capabilities.

items.title: CompTIA Reports U.S. Tech Hiring Remains Flat in December
items.summary: CompTIA analysis of U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics data shows technology employment stayed neutral in December, with tech companies cutting 1,461 positions across technical and non-technical roles.
